job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Looking for motivated front-end/mobile/full-stack engineers ready to take on the challenge of working for a fast-paced start up. We have a very up to date stack that will provide you with experience in a distributed microservice architecture that leverages many top current technologies. We are looking for someone who is a big team player and likes to engage in building solutions from beginning to end with the team. <br><br>Required Experience:<br>- Experience with modern JS frameworks (React, Angular, Vue) OR Flutter<br>GraphQL<br>- 2+ years of experience building modern web/mobile applications<br>- Unit testing, e2e testing<br>- Event driven architectures, microservice architecture<br><br>Bonus Experience:<br>- Kubernetes, Docker<br>- AWS<br>- C#<br>- Kafka, Confluent
